Class BankAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • BankAccount

  • public class BankAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    The BankAccount class simulates a bank account.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BankAccount()
      This constructor sets the starting balance at 0.0.
      BankAccount(double startBalance)
      This constructor sets the starting balance to the value passed as an argument.
      BankAccount(java.lang.String str)
      This constructor sets the starting balance to the value in the String argument.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deposit(double amount)
      The deposit method makes a deposit into the account.
      void deposit(java.lang.String str)
      The deposit method makes a deposit into the account.
      double getBalance()
      The getBalance method returns the account balance.
      void setBalance(double b)
      The setBalance method sets the account balance.
      void setBalance(java.lang.String str)
      The setBalance method sets the account balance.
      void withdraw(double amount)
      The withdraw method withdraws an amount from the account.
      void withdraw(java.lang.String str)
      The withdraw method withdraws an amount from the account.
